relation: Not much if you don't live a wild party life.
Get things done ahead of time and keep all emails and papers for your personal records.
This school is very unorganized and the offices where you go to get help are filled with women with very nasty attitudes. I had to wait months for my financial aid to come. The people are very rude.
pageTitle: Fort Valley State University (FVSU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {144164=I have never lived on campus but judging from stories told to me, It is a fun experience. There have been newer dorms opened since 2009, and everyone loves them., 24104=Food and dining is great. We get different foods for different holidays. Around Mardi grass we get a lot of cajun food and for cinco de mayo we get Mexican food., 171761=The cafeteria is wonderful. They just renovated it. The have this special time called Late Night that ends at 10:30. So, after all that studying you can go and grab a bite to eat in the cafe that's located on campus., 234424=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 145338=Fort Valley is a great experience for all kind but especially those of a minority group. It has grown much over the past 3 years including a new gym, new dorms and a new student center. Receiving my degree from Fort Valley State University, in December, will be 1 of the biggest accomplishments in my life!}

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here The atmosphere at THE Fort Valley State University is very homey. You would adapt almost immediately to the campus, the peers, and school staff. Am learning a lot College is totally different than high school. You not only learn about academics but you also learn life lessons. Login to rate or flag the reviews jermaine from college park, GA 07/23/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 10 out of 10 people found this review useful. 2 of 57 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students for any prospective students i would say take the compass test seriously, take advantage of the help available to you, and stay on your financial aid counselor.
